archimate:DataObject.name: Descriptive Metadata
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A resource for purposes such as discovery and identification. It can include elements such as title, abstract, author, and keywords. Three types of Metadata exist: * Descriptive metadata; for finding or understanding a resource. * Administrative metadata - Technical metadata; - Preservation metadata - Rights metadata Source: http://www.niso.org/publications/press/UnderstandingMetadata.pdf
